9. What were your reasons for coming West?

   Spirit of adventure. Have an uncle in Argentina wanted me to go there instead of Canada. Also lived in France on uncle of friend in Argentina.

10. How did you learn about the West? (Through other people? Reading about it? Railroad)

    Other source paper
11. What did your friends and relatives think of your decision to come to Western Canada?

Thought was good.

12. Did you travel by yourself or with a party (family, friends or other group)? By myself.

13. What means of transportation did you use? Boat in town.

14. What incidents of the journey West do you remember? (People you met on the way, meetings with Indians, adventures on the journey, accidents or other excitement, etc.)

Didn't think much of the travel and what that had been happen about so much.

15. Where did you first stay when you arrived in Saskatchewan? Willow Bunch

16. Where did you settle or take up land? Willow Bunch

17. Mention any other places where you have lived since coming to Saskatchewan.

Manitoba

18. How did you earn a living before coming to Western Canada? How, after you came?

Worked on farms, but not too much. Short worked on ranches here in a store, bought from Moon farm. Own our own store.

Vernatale

Worked on farms pulling teams or first worked on ranches then on a store bought from Moore farm.
